item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:10, topic:352901”][quote author=Ahyo link=topic=449216.msg3295933#msg3295933 date=1280944398]
^^ ill try that right now.

nope still didnt work man ):
[/quote]

Wouldn’t it be much easier to just have when they log in they have the starter in their inventory, and don’t have to type the command?

¬Leo.[/quote]

i was ganna do that but i didnt know how, and i wasnt ganna make a whole new topic just to ask someone how to do it. ): But im just ganna try this last on above me, and if it doesnt work im just ganna add the starter to the inventory.

i just tried that new code he uploaded, and it doesnt work. Im just ganna make a new topic on how to put the starter in the inventory.

item.title: Making starter for non-staff?
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

[quote=“Ahyo, post:1, topic:352901”]heyy i had edited a starter that was already made on the server, but apparently the starter is for staff only. I want to make it so that it is for Reg players who just just started playing. this is what my starter is like…

}
if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 250);
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(6107, 1);
addItem(6108, 1);
addItem(2902, 1);
addItem(6109, 1);
addItem(6568, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);
addItem(3842, 1);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage (“MmaScape Starter”);
}

^^this the new updated Starter i have, but it still has the same problem.[/quote]
Oh, I see the problem now! Change it too this:

} if (command.startsWith("starter") && starter == 0)) { addItem(995, 25000000); addItem(392, 250); addItem(1323, 1); addItem(1333, 1); addItem(6585, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6107, 1); addItem(6108, 1); addItem(2902, 1); addItem(6109, 1); addItem(6568, 1); addItem(5698, 1); addItem(4587, 1); addItem(3842, 1); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("MmaScape Starter"); }

I added an extra “)” to the end of the second line! And deleted the space in-between the “sendMessage” and the “(“MmaScape Starter”);”!

Read full topic

item.title: Making starter for non-staff?
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

[quote=“Da Vinci, post:4, topic:352901”][quote author=Ahyo link=topic=449216.msg3295764#msg3295764 date=1280932230]

&& playerRights >= 0
Change it to
&& playerRights = 0

ok lemme try that (:
[/quote]

Umm that’s wrong. You need to have two ='s

if (command.startsWith("starter") && playerRights == 0) {

Hope I helped!
~Leo.[/quote]

kk lemme try THAT
Nope still didnt work ): any other ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Making starter for non-staff?
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

heyy i had edited a starter that was already made on the server, but apparently the starter is for staff only. I want to make it so that it is for Reg players who just just started playing. this is what my starter is like…

}
if (command.startsWith(“starter”) && starter >= 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 250);
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1333, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(6107, 1);
addItem(6108, 1);
addItem(2902, 1);
addItem(6109, 1);
addItem(6568, 1);
addItem(5698, 1);
addItem(4587, 1);
addItem(3842, 1);
starter = 0;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 0) {
sendMessage(“MmaScape Starter”);
}

^^this the new updated Starter i have, but it still has the same problem.

Read full topic
